channel.title: Dapps on Hashelot - Decentralized ventures
channel.description: Recent content in Dapps on Hashelot - Decentralized ventures

item.title: Chronicles - Notarization on the Ethereum blockchain
item.description: A smart contract for setting customized and permanent checkpoints on the blockchain. So far, just an idea.

item.title: Delphi - Be your own oracle, sort of
item.description: Become and advertise yourself as an oracle, no tokens needed. Coming soon.

item.title: Hodler - You'd better hold on that precious Ether
item.description: A set of tools for better holding on your precious Ether such as time locks, password safes, and trading protocols. Coming a bit less soon.
